 hmm, you seem to dislike baseball for some of the reasons I like it. It relies more on thinking, at least on the part of the player, then probably any other sport, yet involves plenty of physical activity. And you can always get better. Hell when the superstars are the ones who get hits 3 out of 10 times, you know it must be hard. You've gotta be able to think through the game, have the instinct to know what to do, and the physical ability to hit and throw the ball. A combination of many things. Football may have more strategy for the coach (play-calling and such), but no sport requires more thinking than baseball for the player.
